metadata.name: Original Vanguards Pass
metadata.description:
The Original Vanguards Pass is the first VYDER digital collectible. It was claimed by the first Vanguards, our earliest and most committed community members. Each pass provides lifetime benefits to the holders, such as:

* Play early versions of our sword fighting arena game
* Influence the game development
* Impact the evolution of the VYDER sci-fi universe
* Get access to exclusive items

That's not all, as even more benefits will be announced in the future!
